desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Wakamo waits for Sensei in the fierce rain and wind so she can keep her promise with Sensei. Sensei realizes that all the chaos she's been causing is because of the promise they made, so Sensei travels through the rain and wind to get to Wakamo. Sensei sits by a bonfire with Wakamo to warm her up and listens to her story.
desc.jp: Wakamo waits for Sensei in the fierce rain and wind so she can keep her promise with Sensei. Sensei realizes that all the chaos she's been causing is because of the promise they made, so Sensei travels through the rain and wind to get to Wakamo. Sensei sits by a bonfire with Wakamo to warm her up and listens to her story.
desc.zh_cn: 面对询问是否还记得半途而废的「约定」的{cf若藻}，老师回应了希望可以等到工作结束。之后，即使联系了也没有回应，天气渐渐恶化……为了找{cf若藻}奔向暴风雨中时，看见了守护「约定」暴露于风雨中，一心一意持续等着自己的她的身影。必须温暖被风雨冻僵的{cf若藻}而筑起营火，两人度过了安稳的时光。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.

desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!

The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!

因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？
